price: ‘পূৰ্বৱৰ্তীসকলৰ দৰে যদি আমাৰো এখন উপদেশমূলক কিতাব থাকিলহেঁতেন,
arabic: لَوۡ أَنَّ عِندَنَا ذِكۡرٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: law anna ʿindanā dhik'ran mina al-awalīna
